description: Mute a user in all text and voice channels.

extendedHelp: Mute up to ten members of the server with an optional time and reason.
This command requires the **Manage Roles** permission, and only members with a lower role can be managed by me.
The server owner cannot be kicked.
This moderation command can be optionally timed to create a temporary mute. I will remove the member's roles temporarily and give them back after they are unmuted.
The muted role is **sticky**, if the member tries to remove it by rejoining the server it will be added back.
If there is no mute role setup in your server I will first prompt you to configure an existing role.
If you want, I can also create a new role with the correct permission overwrites set up for you.
explainedUsage: The user(s) to kick from the server, can be a total of 10 users.
The amount of time this mute should last. For example `24h` for 24 hours. The user(s) will be automatically unmuted after this time.
The reason for the mute. This will also show in the server's audit logs.
detailedDescription.reminder: If the `modules.moderation.events.mute-add` settings key is enabled I will also log when you manually add the mute role to a user.
